div.p: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

I think it's better to have an enjoyable job because you will be happy for the rest of your life. And if you choose a job just to make money, every morning you get up but no with happiness and this lack can influence your life like your family life, personal life, your life in couple. Moreover, if you work with a man that the only thing he wants it's money, he will be more stressful and it's not a good way to make a good work and to feel like home in our company or industry or manufactory, and go on. But of course the best, it's to find the both: an enjoyable job and a job with you can make money because like that your life will become perfect and with happiness and no bad problems like money problem
